main.name: Paurush Srivastava
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Paurush Srivastava! A determined Software Engineer having around 4 years of experience participating in the complete development lifecycle of successful software applications. I am an enthusiast, a learner, and passionate about multiple Full Stack Web Technologies. The web applications I like to create have JavaScript at the core. I am willing to work on projects alone or as a part of a highly talented team. Listed are the technologies I am sound with: React JS ( Web App Development ), React Native ( Mobile App Development ), Redux, JavaScript ES6, TypeScript, REST APIs, HTML5, CSS3, Git, SQL, Cosmos DB.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for any leads!

education.school: National Institue of Science and Technology - Odisha

work.title: Software Engineer III
work.description1: • Develop interactive, user-friendly applications using React JS concepts for Web App Development and React Native for Mobile App Development.
work.description2: • Contribute reusable components to the Walmart UI Development community.
work.description3: • Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.
work.description4: • Measure and resolve performance bottlenecks using tools like Chrome DevTools, Lighthouse, etc.
work.description5: • Actively participate in full software development lifecycle including planning, designing, coding, testing, and implementing.

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description1: • Developed and implemented highly responsive user interface components using React JS concepts.
work.description2: • Translated UI/UX Mock-ups or wireframes into high quality code and the application.
work.description3: • Contributed to all phases of software development life cycle having extensive experience working in an Agile development environment.
work.description4: • Provided continuous value to customers through regular enhancements, timely bug fixes, and code refactoring.

work.title: Frontend Web Developer
work.description1: • Redesigned and simplified prevalent complex user interface while preserving all functionalities.
work.description2: • Built clean, precise browser-compatible and reusable code and performed browser-based debugging.
work.description3: • Designed, developed, and implemented tools and solutions to support agile development process.
work.description4: • Experience working with Project Management Tools like VersionOne, JIRA.

testimonials.text: I was impressed by Paurush's ability to handle any situation calmly and patiently, good team player . Keep up the good work
Paurush is very strong with his front end skills (react js). He is very passionate about his learning and growing as an individual in team.
Paurush is most dedicated professional I’ve worked with. We worked together at Infosys and he helped me a lot to get started and also to understand internal processes.

I know paurush as a hard-working and very serious team player. He is energetic, helpful, positive attitude person. His expertise as a developer considerable and his contribution is valuable to project.
Paurush is a hard working guy having a vast knowledge in his technical field. Apart from academics he is also a good team player and fully dedicated person towards his Goals.
testimonials.user: Ashar Jami (Site Engineer, Muthroot FinCorp Ltd.)

testimonials.text: A hard working and fun loving person, would be the best way to describe Paurush. His optimism at the workplace is appreciable. A curious guy, who never settles for average and puts all his effort to attain perfection in whatever he does.
